subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Boston College forward Shamari Spears is transferring to Charlotte after finishing as the Eagles’ third-leading scorer last season. A Charlotte spokesman said Tuesday that Spears wanted to be closer to his home in Salisbury, N.C., because of an undisclosed family medical issue. The 6-foot-6 Spears averaged 9.6 points and 6.1 rebounds for the Eagles and played nearly 27 minutes a game last season.
